description: Clean Flash Player is a distribution of Adobe Flash Player, with the mission of keeping the original Flash Player alive for compatibility and ease of use. Clean Flash Player builds are necessary because the Chinese variant of the Flash Player comes bundled with built-in spyware and adware.
notes: The Clean Flash Player installer will automatically close all browser windows when updating Flash Player. It will also uninstall all previous versions of Flash Player, as well as the adware Flash Center application. The installer will also create an uninstaller that you can use to uninstall Clean Flash at any time.
